message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.CE 

This paper deals with the problem of evaluating policies for the multi-armed bandit problem, which is a well-known problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes an extension of an existing offline evaluation method for the continuous armed bandit problem, which is a variant of the multi-armed bandit problem. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science).
